name: iDiscipulus
overview:
iDiscipulus is a free-to-access service dedicated to the Singapore student’s empowerment. It is a Singapore online platform dedicated to the student’s intellectual, emotional, and social needs. By answering the student’s every need, iD hopes to help him or her utilise the internet’s true potential in a safe and secure environment.

iDiscipulus’ vision is to have every Singapore school student connected to each other through its one-stop portal; to have every student studying, learning, sharing, and talking through its portal.

iDiscipulus seeks to spearhead the development and growth of the internet as a platform for the provision of high quality education services â€“ facilitating their accessibility and affordability to all students in Singapore; and to enhance the quality of life of those dedicated to the teaching profession.

The Benefits of Membership:

  • Students can pose academic questions to current/past NIE-trained school teachers round-the-clock through our ground-breaking Ask-A-Tutor 24/7 system, an online learning exchange for Singapore JC, Secondary and Primary school students.

  • Students have access to our free Share Notes facility for, uploading personal study notes, sharing these notes with students from all over Singapore, and finding notes to supplement their own.

  • Parents looking to guide their children in homework can access round-the-clock help through our Ask-A-Tutor 24/7 system.

  • Teachers selected for the panel of our Ask-A-Tutor 24/7 system can provide private tuition at their own convenient time and pace â€” without ever leaving home!

offices.address1: 6 Temasek Boulevard 29th Floor Suntec Tower Four
